rules_text:
Modified attacking creatures you control get +1/+0 and have menace. [i](Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)[/i]
Whenever a nontoken modified creature you control dies, create a 1/1 red Spirit creature token.
_
rules_text2:
When Ian, Sunmade Flamecrafter, enters, unsheath. [i](Create a colorless Weapon artifact equipment token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+1” and “Equip {1}.”)[/i]
{T}, Sacrifice a token you control: Support 2. [i](Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.)[/i]
_
